verses.verse: שַׁאֲל֨וּ <S%H7592><s%> Ask מֵיְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> ye of the LORD מָטָר֙ <S%H4306><s%> rain בְּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> in the time מַלְק֔וֹשׁ <S%H4456><s%> of the latter rain יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [so] the LORD עֹשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> shall make חֲזִיזִ֑ים <S%H2385><s%> bright clouds וּמְטַר־ <S%H4306><s%> of rain גֶּ֙שֶׁם֙ <S%H1653><s%> them showers יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and give לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like לְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to every one עֵ֥שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> grass בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> in the field

כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> because הַתְּרָפִ֣ים <S%H8655><s%> For the idols דִּבְּרוּ־ <S%H1696><s%> have spoken אָ֗וֶן <S%H205><s%> vanity וְהַקּֽוֹסְמִים֙ <S%H7080><s%> and the diviners חָ֣זוּ <S%H2372><s%> have seen שֶׁ֔קֶר <S%H8267><s%> a lie וַֽחֲלֹמוֹת֙ <S%H2472><s%> dreams הַשָּׁ֣וא <S%H7723><s%> false. יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <S%H1696><s%> and have told הֶ֖בֶל <S%H1892><s%> in vain יְנַֽחֵמ֑וּן <S%H5162><s%> they comfort עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> after that נָסְע֣וּ <S%H5265><s%> therefore they went כְמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> like צֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> their way as a flock יַעֲנ֖וּ <S%H6031><s%> they were troubled כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> there רֹעֶֽה׃ <S%H7462><s%> because [there was] no shepherd פ

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָֽרֹעִים֙ <S%H7462><s%> against the shepherds חָרָ֣ה <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> Mine anger וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָעַתּוּדִ֖ים <S%H6260><s%> the goats אֶפְק֑וֹד <S%H6485><s%> and I punished כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for פָקַד֩ <S%H6485><s%> hath visited יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD צְבָא֤וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶדְרוֹ֙ <S%H5739><s%> his flock אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְשָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> and hath made אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> כְּס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> horse הוֹד֖וֹ <S%H1935><s%> them as his goodly בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> in the battle

מִמֶּ֤נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at פִנָּה֙ <S%H6438><s%> the corner מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> them יָתֵ֔ד <S%H3489><s%> out of him the nail מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> them קֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> bow מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> out of him the battle מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> them יֵצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> Out of him came forth כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every נוֹגֵ֖שׂ <S%H5065><s%> out of him every oppressor יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

וְהָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> will be as כְגִבֹּרִ֜ים <S%H1368><s%> And they shall be as mighty בּוֹסִ֨ים <S%H947><s%> [men] which tread down בְּטִ֤יט <S%H2916><s%> [their enemies] in the mire חוּצוֹת֙ <S%H2351><s%> of the streets בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> in the battle וְנִ֨לְחֲמ֔וּ <S%H3898><s%> and they shall fight כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD עִמָּ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> with וְהֹבִ֖ישׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> shall be confounded רֹכְבֵ֥י <S%H7392><s%> [is] with them and the riders סוּסִֽים׃ <S%H5483><s%> on horses

וְגִבַּרְתִּ֣י ׀ <S%H1396><s%> And I will strengthen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph אוֹשִׁ֔יעַ <S%H3467><s%> and I will save וְהֽוֹשְׁבוֹתִים֙ <S%H7725><s%> will bring כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because רִֽחַמְתִּ֔ים <S%H7355><s%> them for I have mercy וְהָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> shall be as כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> upon them and they shall be as though לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not זְנַחְתִּ֑ים <S%H2186><s%> I had not cast them off כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Because אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> their God וְאֶעֱנֵֽם׃ <S%H6030><s%> and will hear

וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> will be like כְגִבּוֹר֙ <S%H1368><s%> shall be like a mighty אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> And [they of] Ephraim וְשָׂמַ֥ח <S%H8055><s%> shall rejoice לִבָּ֖ם <S%H3820><s%> [man] and their heart כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> if יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> as through wine וּבְנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> yea their children יִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall see וְשָׂמֵ֔חוּ <S%H8056><s%> glad יָגֵ֥ל <S%H1523><s%> shall rejoice לִבָּ֖ם <S%H3820><s%> their heart בַּיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD

אֶשְׁרְקָ֥ה <S%H8319><s%> I will hiss לָהֶ֛ם וַאֲקַבְּצֵ֖ם <S%H6908><s%> for them and gather כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for פְדִיתִ֑ים <S%H6299><s%> them for I have redeemed וְרָב֖וּ <S%H7235><s%> them and they shall increase כְּמ֥וֹ <S%H3644><s%> will be as רָבֽוּ׃ <S%H7235><s%> as they have increased

וְאֶזְרָעֵם֙ <S%H2232><s%> And I will sow בָּֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> them among the people וּבַמֶּרְחַקִּ֖ים <S%H4801><s%> me in far countries יִזְכְּר֑וּנִי <S%H2142><s%> and they shall remember וְחָי֥וּ <S%H2421><s%> and they shall live אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> with their children וָשָֽׁבוּ׃ <S%H7725><s%> and turn again

וַהֲשִֽׁיבוֹתִים֙ <S%H7725><s%> I will bring them again מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> also out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וּמֵֽאַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> them out of Assyria אֲקַבְּצֵ֑ם <S%H6908><s%> and gather וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֶ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them into the land גִּלְעָ֤ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead וּלְבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> and Lebanon אֲבִיאֵ֔ם <S%H935><s%> and I will bring וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יִמָּצֵ֖א <S%H4672><s%> and [place] shall not be found לָהֶֽם׃

וְעָבַ֨ר <S%H5674><s%> And he shall pass through בַּיָּ֜ם <S%H3220><s%> the sea צָרָ֗ה <S%H6869><s%> with affliction וְהִכָּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> and shall smite בַיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> in the sea גַּלִּ֔ים <S%H1530><s%> the waves וְהֹבִ֕ישׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> shall dry up כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מְצוּל֣וֹת <S%H4688><s%> and all the deeps יְאֹ֑ר <S%H2975><s%> of the river וְהוּרַד֙ <S%H3381><s%> shall be brought down גְּא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> and the pride אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וְשֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> and the sceptre מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt יָסֽוּר׃ <S%H5493><s%> shall depart away

וְגִבַּרְתִּים֙ <S%H1396><s%> And I will strengthen בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> them in the LORD וּבִשְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> in his name יִתְהַלָּ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> and they shall walk up and down נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס
